column1: #text=This morning I arrived at the train station to take a train to my sisters house in Texas .
#text=I had pre-purchased my ticket for the Amtrak train leaving a 6 am .
#text=So I arrived around 30 minute before hand to check in and get to the platform in time to get my train .
#text=This was the first time have taken a long distance train and figured it would be similar to the local city trains I take to work each day .
#text=As the train boards I found my correct car and seat .
#text=I entered the car and saw how much nicer these trains are compared to the local one .
#text=The seats were similar to seats on a tour coach , and was actually quite nice inside .
#text=I brought a book along to read and help pass the time .
#text=I settled in my seat and a nice elderly woman sat down next to me , We exchanged pleasantries and she puled out a blanket she was crocheting for her grandson .
#text=I was fascinated with her work and she started to teach me as the train pulled away from the platform .
#text=She spent most of the trip working on the blanket as I watched .
#text=Eight hours later , it seemed like much less , the train pulled into the station and it was time for me to get off .
#text=I said good bye to the woman and thanked her for teaching me what she had .
#text=She went back to her work as I got off the train .
#text=My sister was waiting on the platform for me and we got into her car and headed to the nearest craft store to purchase crocheting supplies .
